title: Ticket #6: Remove Delete function for Tickets
description: Change the Delete button on tickets to a Close button, deleting a ticket will result in the ticket's id being recycled
remarks:
2009-Jan-14 11:19:12 by matt:
"The Delete privilege give the user the ability to erase wiki, tickets, and atttachments that have been added by anonymous users. This capability is intended for deletion of spam."

So maybe the Delete button should just be made less prominent, everyone already knows not to use it

2009-Jan-29 07:54:58 by tannenba:
Seems reasonable to assume that once the site is open, we will actually truly want Delete around to get rid of spam.
